title: Sergei Shalin
text:
Sergei Valeryevich Shalin (; born 14 August 1990) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Vladimir">FC Torpedo Vladimir</a> on 4 April 2011 in a game against <a href="FC%20Alania%20Vladikavkaz">FC Alania Vladikavkaz</a>.
